SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup in Brno. PROVIDERS: Main carriers are GLS, PPL, Balíkovna (Česká pošta), and Zásilkovna. Wolt is used for express delivery in Brno. PRICING: Prices range from 59 Kč (GLS Parcel Shop) to 119 Kč (PPL Home Delivery). In-store pickup is free. Free shipping is available for orders over 2500 Kč when choosing GLS pickup points or Balíkovna home delivery. COD surcharge is 49 Kč. NOTABLE FEATURES: Express 90-minute delivery is available in Brno via Wolt. There are size and weight restrictions for certain services (Zásilkovna, Balíkovna pickup points), preventing the shipment of bulky items like strollers or furniture via these methods. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. A comprehensive table lists all options and prices, followed by detailed descriptions for each service. The information is easy to find and understand.
